text: Bussy-Chardonney was a municipality in Morges in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. == History == The municipality was created in 1961 by a merger of Bussy-sur-Morges and Chardonney-sur-Morges.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 18 February 2011 This union also existed before 1744 and between 1799 and 1819. On 1 July 2021, the former municipalities of Apples, Bussy-Chardonney, Cottens, Pampigny, Reverolle and SÃ©very merged to form the new municipality of Hautemorges.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 16 August 2021 == References == == Other websites == * Official site Category:Former municipalities of Vaud
title: Bussy-Chardonney
